RxML.TEXT: <gender>Female</gender> <age>25-34</age> <treatment_length>less than 1 month</treatment_length> <satisfaction>1</satisfaction> <effectiveness>4</effectiveness> <condition>Condition: Birth Control</condition> <comment>I was given Junel because my original BC Gildes was recalled.
